name: Club MAC Alcudia

reviews.text: Got back from the holiday 4 August. My husband myself and our 15 year old son. We arrived at the hotel 5.30am and we're very tired we checked in and went up to our room 8th floor which we did request, we did request pool view which we did'nt get so my husband went back down and asked but the reception said we'd have to sort it out later. (we did'nt bother in the end) The room was very small it had two double beds, the sheets won't very clean on one of the beds. Our room was'nt cleaned very good the cleaner on a couple of occasions just throw the sheets back over the beds, did'nt leave toilet rolls, put towels in the room which had blood on them. There were 7 lifts and half the time you had to wait ages for the lifts cause kids we're playing around in them. The food was'nt very good and it felt like being in a cattle market racing to get to the restaurant you sat on top of the other tables they could'nt get enough tables in. We found the staff in the restaurant unfriendly never smiled even when collecting our plates. Litter everywhere, people being sick in the lobby. Our son is no angel but he certainly would'nt behave like some of the other kids and the parents just had no control over them they just let them run riot and please themselfs. 4.00am kids would be running up and down the corridors banging on doors and slamming them. There was a lobby bar and an outside bar but only the outside bar was in use even though there was always a long que. We had a early hour flight so we was advised that there was secure luggage room for us to keep our luggage in but when we collected it we found our son's psp and eyepod was stolen and when we reported this to the front desk they told us that the security key cards were kept on the front desk so anybody could pick one up. I would certainly not recommend this hotel to anyone. Although it is only a three star hotel you still expect a certain standard of service and quality of food. Although we booked all inclusive we had to buy bottled water, they did supply one filtered water tap on the outside bar which you had to que for to refill your empty bottles. So it was easier to buy new bottles out of the machine. The swimming pools were inadequate for the three hotels that were using them...
reviews.title: one week of hell
horrendous !
reviews.text: although the hotel was spotless and the gardens great, the whole complex is fully smoking exepting a very small lounge.

I dont consider the hotel is safe for children, due to the high volume of smoking, it is a definate health risk, due to the very high level of smokining, especially the children who obvioulsly who have no choice as to were to go in the complex
reviews.title: Four hours were alll we could hack!!!
Remember a holiday is what u make it : Phil Russell
reviews.text: The food is OK. exept it is cold or at best luke warm. the noise is horrendous. there are no quite/piano bars just one smokey noisy bar in each hotel, with a very small N/S area, which is rearly enforced. In short.

reviews.title: Great laugh
reviews.text: IF YOU DONT SMOKE,WOULD LIKE A CHOICE OF A QUITE/PIANO BAR, HOT FOOD, DONT GO, YOU WONT ENJOY IT

reviews.title: Holiday From Hell!!!!!!!
reviews.text: Just arrived back from the worst holiday i have ever had.Where do i start,well we arrived at 1am waited for the lift but was broken so had to carry bags up 3 floors with a small child not easy, had a look around the pool area to find dirty nappy floating around in the pool about 30 sandwiches thrown all over and plastic cups.woke the next very early as the complex is so loud as there is about 4000 people.went to the buffet for lunch to find BONES and CHIPS chopped up ribbs with a bit of fat on.watered down drinks and cheap pop warm/cold food.hotel lift when working was filthy dirty drink and food up the doors.room was also filthy dirty eg stained toilet,dirty bath,dirty windows,mirrors and patio set.every evening could never get a seat to watch entertainment so many were left standing or pulling out sun loungers to sit on.It was that bad we paid to move hotel for the last 4 days of our holiday.I could go on much more about this vile place but i think i will leave it there but i hope it will save a few people waisting thousands of pounds.If you are looking for a place where you can relax do not go to the jupiter

We returned from the Marte hotel on 19th August. We would not go there again due to it being very over-crowded and full of ignorant British people. We have never seen so many people crammed into one complex at one time. We did not stay in the complex of an evening at all as it was sub-standard and even if we wanted to there was nowhere to sit!!
reviews.title: Don't go there!

reviews.text: We actually only booked this hotel as my teen-age daughter's friend was going to be there - you know. the I'm bored with my parents age!! As it turned out her friend's family were transferred to another hotel due to over-booking! Lucky them!
reviews.title: People Stop Moaning

reviews.text: We paid £3,300 for 4 of us. Why??? This place is a disgrace. We felt very sorry for the staff who tried their hardest to be pleasant and to keep the place clean and tidy, but it was very difficult with the 'type' of people that were there. We are not snobs or anything, but we were embarassed by the slobbish behaviour of some people and their loutish children. My 13 and 16 year old children stuck by our sides at all times.
reviews.title: worst holiday ever

likes.liked: — children's park cos it was free
likes.disliked: — queue's and extra cost for children's rides

reviews.text: The food was very average and repetetive. We ate out on a number of occassions. We spent far more money than we intended due to wanting to get out of the place!!!!!
reviews.title: Some people are just too fussy!!!

likes.disliked: — Too many flights of stairs and not enough lifts

reviews.title: A week from HELL! Never Ever Again!
reviews.text: Well what can I say, actually quite a lot! It was the worst holiday I have ever been on and I was very embarrased to be English!
Firstly, If you have booked to go hear and you are unsure then Cancel otherwise you will waste your money like we did and you will have a horrible time.
reviews.title: Pontins in the sun

reviews.text: I travelled with my partner and his two teenage children on Tuesday 8th August 2006. It all started as we flew with Air Europa (Never Again), we had paid for a meal on our flight and ended up with a disgusting, soggy roll with horrible ham (what if you were vegetarian?)
reviews.title: Can it really be that bad?

reviews.text: We got to the Jupiter Hotel at 6pm and on first apperances it looked quite nice. The guy who served us on reception was very nice but he was the only one there and there were about 20 people to check in after us!
reviews.title: Great holiday at the Jupiter

likes.liked: — Excellent Family Room divided into 2 sections
likes.disliked: — Bit noisy for about an hour or so around midnight

reviews.text: We got to our rooms, these were alright, what would you really expect in a 3 star hotel. We decided to get changed and go down to dinner!
reviews.title: Fair

reviews.text: We booked the cheapest all inclusive holiday, that catered for children of all ages, that we could find.
reviews.title: What a lovely time!

likes.liked: — Simple clean tidy rooms and hotel, happy staff, good food
likes.disliked: — um... ummm... Oh! the coffee machines, no real coffee or tea available :-)

reviews.text: The reviews on here seemed to be ok from people with children and not too good from couples..
reviews.title: what a great place

likes.liked: — view of the mountains and pool

reviews.title: A very busy hotel
reviews.text: Just right then!
The Jupiter hotel was like a great big butlins holiday camp, but with sunshine!
reviews.title: fantastic holiday, would definately recommend

reviews.text: The place was excellent for the money. It was clean, and tidy and happy.
reviews.title: Dont Go Unless You Are Mad!!

likes.liked: — paper thin walls, prison cell style room, damp, crowded broken lifts

aka: Club Mac Alcudia Hotel Port d`Alcudia
description: Club Mac is an all inclusive complex located in Puerto Alcudia, Mallorca. The resort specialises in families and at their disposal there are 100.000 square meters with a wide offer for all tastes. Two natural lakes, one of them with kayaks, water bikes and pedalos, spacious gardens, nine swimming pools, including a splash pool for small children and a river pool, Children Village for children between 4 and 12 years old, two entertainment areas: a spectacular stage with professional shows and another area with live music or entertainment every night, two indoor bars, five outdoor bars, three restaurants, burger kiosk , tennis court, sand multi sports court, mini golf, running track, archery, small train around the complex for the younger ones, souvenir shop, etc.The complex has three buildings in which you will be able to find rooms to suit your requirements. Marte, Jupiter o Saturno, all of them with the same quality and good service and sharing all facilities between them.
